item.description:
We are pleased to host PMC and Fimo artist and instructor, Jenny Weiss as well as Abeille's junior artist and Jenny's cousin, Sarah Silvestri on Wednesday, December 15 from 6-8pm

They will be sharing demonstrations and great tips so stop by to support these taled Brookline based jewelry artists.

For more details and photos, check out Abeille's Events Page.

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: FREE: Fimo Clay work and Beaded Jewelry Trunk Show and Demonstrations
